title: Crime Alert 02.11.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 02.11.19
description:
Was Michael Jackson a pop star pedophile? His former maid says yes.  A a 9-year-old Iowa boy testifies to abuse at the hands of his dad's girlfriend. And caught on camera – check out this inmate who may have scouted out an escape, but you know what happens to the best laid plans.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
